quote: This is me.’"" He handed her the precious scrap of paper. ‘Call me or I’ll call you, but one of us will call, yes? What I mean is it’s not a competition. You don’t lose if you phone first.
quote_letters: THIS IS ME HE HANDED HER THE PRECIOUS SCRAP OF PAPER CALL ME OR ILL CALL YOU BUT ONE OF US WILL CALL YES WHAT I MEAN IS ITS NOT A COMPETITION YOU DONT LOSE IF YOU PHONE FIRST
